description:
Hi there! Whether you are long term unemployed, an early school leaver or re-educating yourself for a change of direction, this course delivers the 7 completely transferable key skills that come from over 20 years experience in the most competitive industry on the planet!

Combined with live coaching support, videos, Mash-ups, downloadable PDFs, helpful reference sites and external collaborative events, this course has been developed with you as an individual in mind and these skills are delivered in a way that is cost effective and easy for you to identify with, allowing you to get started on your own road to success today.

Just to be clear, the course developer was one of the hundreds of hopefuls who did NOT make it to super stardom in this competitive industry BUT the skills she learned and applies everyday have been priceless in helping create the opportunities and success she enjoys today.

The layered effect of this course means that you start as a novice and finish as an expert. Armed with the skills to know what you want to do, to look for and recognize opportunities, to know how to ask for that opportunity and to start with confidence and clarity. The course is compiled of 9 sections with each section containing between 2 to 8 lectures in each.

These lectures combine practical and theoretical information and examples. Each theoretical part of the lecture stays within a 30 minute time frame. The practical is up to you as you are the one doing the practice! Yes, you will be getting up off you chair and moving around in this course (you may even be asked to send in a video of your progress for your assessment.)

Looking forward to supporting you soon - Be the Difference to make a Difference!
title: Personal Branding for Beginners using 7 key skills
